cause.description:
Israel is the freest country in the Middle East, but sadly, many of its own internal issues get overlooked in favor of continuing security concerns. The New Israel Fund has made impressive progress in the areas of:
-civil and human rights http://www.nif.org/content.cfm?id=1307&currbody=1
-social and economic justice http://www.nif.org/content.cfm?id=1309&currbody=1
-religious pluralism and tolerance http://www.nif.org/content.cfm?id=1310&currbody=1
-environmental issues http://www.nif.org/content.cfm?id=1751&currbody=1
-women's rights http://www.nif.org/content.cfm?cat_id=1520&currbody=1
and much more.
1. Israel CAN live up to its democratic ideals to ensure equality and justice for all its citizens.
cause.mission: advance civil rights and social justice for ALL Israelis.
cause.name: Helping Israel from the Inside
